name: OWLS - toddler t-shirt
description:
Owls - onesie / toddler t-shirt

If you are in doubt, order one size up.

Please indicate SIZE in the notes when checking out.

SIZES AVAILABLE:
Yellow: 6 and 12 months
Mustard Yellow: 2T, 3T and 4T


CARE:
Machine wash cold and dry low heat.
Turn it inside out to last longer.
Do not iron on art.


All orders are sent via USPS with Delivery Confirmation receipt.
We post within 2-3 days but will do our best to send your purchase ASAP.
